name: messageStatus
doc: Kafka JS schema for cosmos api container 'message-status'

fields.name: schema_version
fields.doc: An integer that indicates the version of the schema.

type.doc: List of operations that can be done to a message.
type.name: MessageStatusCrudOperation

fields.name: id
fields.doc: An id that identifies the status of the message inside the message-status collection.

fields.name: message_id
fields.doc: An ULID that identifies the message inside the message collection.

fields.name: status_version
fields.doc: An integer that indicates the version of the status.

fields.name: is_read
fields.doc: Boolean that indicates if the message has been read.

fields.name: is_archived
fields.doc: Boolean that indicates if the message has been archived.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: A timestamp that indicates when the status was created.
